extendedInfo.description: The World Congress is the premier global event in the field, encompassing malignancies affecting every component of the gastrointestinal tract and aspects related to the care of patients with gastrointestinal cancer. Endorsed by over eight organizations, the Congress educates and updates participating experts by focusing on personalized therapy, multidisciplinary management, and unraveling molecular mechanisms. Co-chaired by Mario DiCato, MD and Eric Van Cutsem, MD, PhD, the 60+ expert specialists leading the sessions and meeting with participants in small targeted groups make the scientific agenda the most comprehensive and effective in addressing the educational needs of thousands of physicians.The WCGC 2013 mobile event app helps you create your conference schedule. Browse sessions, special events, speakers, posters, and more. Plan your time in the Exhibit Hall with the Partner directory and create your list of "mustsee" product and service providers. View maps of the meeting venue and the Expo Hall and interact with fellow attendees through social media channels.
